column1: We wish you a blessed Christmas!
The #coalition agreement is ready. Here for download: http://www.csu.de/aktuell/mteilungen/november-2013/koalitionsvertrag-cdu-csu-spd/…
Stamm: 89.0%, Ramsauer: 86.4%, Schmidt: 88.8%, Gauweiler: 79.1%. Congratulations to the deputy party leaders! # csupt13
With 95.3%, Horst #Seehofer has been confirmed as #party chairman in office. Congratulations! # csupt13
Great speech by #party chairman Horst #Seehofer! # csupt13
And it continues with # csupt13 - day two has started. To the livestream: http://www.csu.de/parteitag2013
Welcome to the # csupt13, Chancellor Angela Merkel!
The #Livestream is running. You can find it here: http://www.csu.de/parteitag2013 # csupt13
Our #party conference starts today from 2.30 p.m. At csu.de you can be there via #Livestream. Twitter with! The hashtag: # csupt13.
